
refresh-trusted-advisor-check
*****************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

This action enables you to query the service to request a refresh for
a specific Trusted Advisor check. Your request body contains a
*CheckId* for which you are querying. The response body contains a
RefreshTrustedAdvisorCheckResult object containing *Status* and
*TimeUntilNextRefresh* fields.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws support refresh-trusted-advisor-check
     --check-id <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--check-id"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
